SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.nickname from lin_user AS u WHERE u.id NOT IN ( SELECT swi.user_id FROM student_work AS swi WHERE swi.work_id = #{workId} AND swi.delete_time IS NULL ) AND u.id IN ( SELECT sc.user_id from student_class AS sc WHERE sc.class_id = ( SELECT w.class_id from work AS w WHERE w.id = #{workId} AND w.delete_time IS NULL ) )
AND (u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%'))

SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.nickname, sw.work_id, sw.ip, sw.create_time, sw.rate, sw.update_time FROM lin_user AS u LEFT JOIN student_work AS sw ON u.id = sw.user_id WHERE u.id IN ( SELECT sc.user_id FROM student_class AS sc WHERE sc.class_id = ( SELECT w.class_id from work AS w WHERE w.id = #{workId} AND w.delete_time IS NULL ) ) AND sw.work_id = #{workId}
AND (u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%'))
UNION SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.nickname, null AS work_id, null AS ip, null AS create_time, null AS rate, null AS update_time FROM lin_user AS u WHERE u.id NOT IN ( SELECT swi.user_id FROM student_work AS swi WHERE swi.work_id = #{workId} AND swi.delete_time IS NULL ) AND u.id IN ( SELECT sc.user_id from student_class AS sc WHERE sc.class_id = ( SELECT w.class_id from work AS w WHERE w.id = #{workId} AND w.delete_time IS NULL ) )
AND (u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%'))
ORDER BY `ip`
DESC
